name: Total Health Institute
tag_list: alternative-cancer-treatments, alternative-cancer-treatment, ibs-treatment, thyroid-treatment, bioidentical-hormones, irritable-bowel-syndrome, detoxification, christian-healing-retreat, cancer-treatment, alternative-cancer-treatment-center
overview: Total Health Institute is the premiere Christ centered inpatient and outpatient teaching and alternative cancer treatment center in the U.S. Our focus is complete healing of the physical body, mind and emotions. We specialize in alternative holistic healthcare, doctor supervised fasting and detoxification, alternative cancer treatments, along with comprehensive inpatient treatment programs to remove all the causes of health challenges instead of just treating the effects (the symptoms, conditions and diseases) with more medication and surgery.
